3.name: Sol
3.text: "Um... um... First, I'll put this... here..."

4.name: Sol
4.text:
"I'll scatter the collected coins here... and
then, I'll decorate the rest on top like this..."

6.name: Sol
6.text: "Yay! I did it! My nest is complete!"

8.name: Sol
8.text:
"Ooooo... happiness... It's like the condensed
essence of all the pleasures in this world..."

10.name: Narration
10.text:
※Dragons instinctively consider hoarding treasure
in their nests to be bliss, and the amount of
treasure determines their status as a dragon.

11.name: Narration
11.text:
When the amount of treasure exceeds a certain
level, it is possible to level up. Furthermore, by
repeating the process of leveling up,
\c[2]shedding\c[0] occurs.

12.name: Narration
12.text:
By shedding, the dragon's body grows about one
size larger. The number of adventurers it can
carry on its back at once also increases, greatly
boosting its fighting power.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
Let's actively gather treasures and bring them
back to the nest!
